title: Shelter from the Texas Heat
description: This novel about keeping secrets and the power of friendship has been compared to the Ya-Ya series and The Help. Redheaded Texan Rachel Frank's idyllic life with architect husband Michael and coed daughter Missy turns upside down. From a glamorous birthday party at Neiman Marcus to painful memories of a Holocaust survivor, the emotional roller coaster ride set in Dallas and Austin from the '60s to the present even includes a stop at the Texas State Fair. Original.
author: Bobbi Kornblit
